title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Trust-Based Interpersonal Skills for Educational Technology Consultants (ITCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of educational technology and experience in university educational settings
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners build trust with instructors by utilizing eight interpersonal skills (active listening, paraphrasing, open/closed questioning, etc.).
In simulated environments, learners effectively communicate technology integration proposals by performing real-world instructor consulting scenarios.
Learners improve interpersonal skills based on feedback to foster an adaptable educational environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
